<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Showstopper](/Feats.aspx?ID=3202) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 118</row>

**Archetypes** [Bullet Dancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=117) (Level 16), [Pistol Phenom](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=120) (Level 16)

**Prerequisites**
[Pistol Twirl](/Feats.aspx?ID=3162); Master in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

Your twirling weapons create a grand distraction that's difficult to look away from. When using Pistol Twirl to [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48), you can target all enemies within your weapon's first range increment who you can perceive and who can see you. You roll one [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) check and compare it against each target's Perception DC.
name: Showstopper
